item.title: Escape from Duckov has sold 2 million copies in two weeks
item.content:encoded:
Chris Kerr, Senior Editor, News, GameDeveloper.com

October 28, 2025

1 Min Read

Newsbrief: Escape From Duckov has sold more than 2 million copies in two weeks. Developer Team Soda and publisher Bilibili shared the news on Steam and thanked players for their support. 

The top-down PvE indie survival RPG, which asks players to scavenge for resources to build a safe haven for their waddling yellow avatar, launched on October 16, 2025, on Steam, Epic Game Store, and MacOS. 

The title launched with an introductory 12 percent discount on Steam that ends on October 30. It has amassed almost 3,200 overwhelmingly positive user reviews on the platform at the time of writing.

About the Author
